title: BBC Local Live: Northamptonshire for Wednesday, 2 December 2015 - BBC News
summary: a man was killed crossing the m1 during a police chase causing the motorway to be closed .
a driver from northampton who says he was `` deliberately and repeatedly rammed '' by a lorry on the m1 has criticised police 's response .
more news , sport , travel and weather from 08:00 on thursday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: we 'll be be back tomorrow from 08:00 with the latest news , sport , travel and weather in the county .

documents.title: administrators warn of redundancies at fairline
text: fairline boats ' administrators , frp advisory llp , say they anticipate redundancies `` in the near term '' although a core team of workers will remain to help sell the business .
existing orders will also be `` serviced '' , according to the administrators .
the company employs around 450 people in oundle and corby .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: referrals to northamptonshire 's anti-terrorism unit have doubled
text: northamptonshire police 's anti-terrorism unit says referrals have risen to around 60 so far this year , twice as many as the same time last year .
so called `` soft targets '' for terrorists , such as pubs , clubs , restaurants and theatres , are now being given advice on what to do in case of a terrorist attack .

dr mils hills , associate professor of risk resilience and corporate security at the university of northampton , said : `` we need to be more conscious about remembering where the exits are and what we can do if the power fails . ''
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: headlines : fairline boats goes into administration man dies after police chase on the m1
text: headlines : fairline boats goes into administration man dies after police chase on the m1
author: Sarah Foster
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: breakingfairline boats goes into administration
text: luxury boat builder fairline , which has factories in oundle and corby , has gone into administration .
staff have been sent home and told to wait until the administrators have assessed the business .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: pubs and restaurants in northamptonshire offered anti-terrorism advice
text: counter-terrorism security advisers are giving town centre venues training about what to do in the event of gun attacks , such as those in paris .
smalls venues used by members of the public , such as pubs , clubs , restaurants , theatres and cinemas are said to be `` soft targets '' for terrorists .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: secure centre 'requires improvement '
text: inspectors say a secure training centre near daventry is improving , but it still has a way to go .
rainsbrook centre was rated `` inadequate '' by ofsted earlier this year .
the latest report says the centre has made ground but , overall , has a rating of `` requires improvement '' .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: breakingm1 reopened after 13-hour closure
text: the m1 southbound between j18 and j16 has reopened after an incident at around 03:25 when a man died .
there is still slow traffic on the motorway .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: northamptonshire mother of girl murdered by yorkshire ripper does n't care where he is as long as he never gets out ''
text: a kettering woman whose daughter was murdered by the yorkshire ripper says she does n't care where he is as long as he never gets out , after reports he could move back to prison .
author: Northampton Chronicle & Echo

documents.title: investigation 'continues ' into mp 's campaign payments
text: there seems to be confusion within the conservative party over the investigation into campaign payments made to the party of northampton south mp , david mackintosh .
earlier some local party members told me no action would be taken over the payments - but now a spokesman at conservative central office has said : `` we are still investigating this matter . ''
i 'm still trying to find out the truth of the matter and will let you know when i hear more .
author: Sam Read
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: m1 southbound still closed 13 hours after incident
text: the m1 southbound is still closed after an incident at 03:25 in which a man died following a police chase
there is queuing traffic and long delays due to the closure between j18 and j16 .
there is also disruption on the m45 eastbound which is closed between j1 and the m1 .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: fatal accident victim named
text: a woman who died in a road accident between slipton and kettering road at 11:30 on monday morning has been named by the police .
rachel dewick , 40 , from kettering , was driving a silver/blue ford focus towards kettering road when there was a collision with a silver/blue ford focus-c max travelling in the opposite direction .
police are appealing for witnesses .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: trading standards warn against illegally importing puppies
text: northamptonshire trading standards wants people who are thinking of buying a dog to be wary of illegally imported puppies .
since october , a slovakian puppy was imported into northamptonshire and had to be quarantined for 21 days .
and recently a dog from moldova was put into quarantine for four months .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: headlines : man dies after police chase on the m1 the conservative party 'to take no action ' over payments to mp 's election fund
text: here are the headlines so far this afternoon :
author: Sarah Foster
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: fairline pensions 'not paid '
text: the unite union is claiming fairline boats , which has factories in oundle and corby , has not paid its employees ' pension contributions for three months .
the luxury boat builder employs 468 people .
it is owned by private equity firm wessex bristol who have not yet commented about the claims .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: noise complaint could see play equipment at wellingborough park re-located
text: a resident 's noise complaint about play equipment near her home may lead to it being made silent or moved to a completely new location .
author: Northamptonshire Telegraph

documents.title: m1 fatality : police and crime commissioner aware of `` tragic incident ''
text: i am aware of the tragic incident on the m1 this morning and await the results of the police investigation and the view of the ipcc . ''

documents.title: m1 fatality following police chase referred to police complaints commission
text: an incident in which a man was killed when he ran across the m1 while trying to escape northamptonshire police officers has been referred to the independent police complaints commission .
the man died when he was struck by a vehicle .
the m1 southbound remains closed while an investigation into what happened takes place .
two lanes of the northbound carriageway are now open .
author: Craig Lewis
BBC News

documents.title: police suspect killed trying to run across m1
text: a man died in a road traffic collision on the m1 this morning , northamptonshire police have revealed .
police officers were following a vehicle , which was believed to be stolen , at about 3.25am on the northbound carriageway when it came to a stop on the road .
once the vehicle had stopped the man got out and ran across the road , at which point he was struck by a vehicle on the southbound carriageway and died .
author: Craig Lewis
BBC News

documents.title: breakingm1 closure caused when man fleeing police was run over
text: the m1 closure today was caused when a man fleeing police stopped his vehicle , ran across the motorway and was struck by a vehicle .
the man was killed as a result .

documents.title: 'no action ' over mp 's campaign payments
text: i understand the conservative party will take no action over campaign payments made to the local party of northampton south mp , david mackintosh .
last week the bbc revealed undeclared payments connected to a businessman at the centre of the redevelopment at sixfields .
mr mackintosh has refused to comment to the bbc about the payments .
author: Sam Read
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: running helps autistic boy
text: since taking up running , 11-year-old will gardiner from rothwell has developed his social skills , according to his mother , kate .
will has been diagnosed with high functioning autism .
will regularly takes part in the corby parkrun .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: severe congestion on roads around m1
text: i shot this video at the truck stop on the a45 near junction 16 of the m1 .
the southbound carriageway of the motorway is still closed between j18 and j16 following a crash .
the closure of the m1 between j16 and j18 has caused delays on surrounding roads .
accident investigators are examining the closed section of motorway and oil is being cleared from the carriageway .
author: Martin Heath
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: breakingm1 northbound re-opens following crash
text: the northbound carriageway of the m1 has re-opened following a crash early this morning .
the southbound carriageway between j18 and j16 remains closed .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: police examine lorry shunt footage
text: northamptonshire police have been shown 'dash cam ' footage of a lorry shunting a car on the m1 near northampton .
it was shot by matthew stockdale , who was driving the car that was hit .
northamptonshire police have apologised for communication failures after no-one responded to his 999 call for three hours .
author: Sally Chidzoy
BBC Look East home affairs correspondent

documents.title: m1 lorry shunt : police failed to attend call for three hours
text: a motorist who says he was `` deliberately and repeatedly rammed '' by a lorry has criticised police for failing to respond to his calls for three hours .
matthew stockdale , who runs a dash cam company and took footage of the incident , said he was repeatedly cut up and shunted three times by the other driver .
he said he made six 999 calls and was connected to three police forces .
northamptonshire police , which took the first call , apologised for communication failures .
author: Sally Chidzoy
BBC Look East home affairs correspondent

documents.title: motorway closures : an empty m45
text: traffic congestion remains severe with the m1 closed in both directions between j16 and j18 and the m45 eastbound is shut between j1 and the m1 .
our colleagues at bbc coventry & warwickshire have tweeted this video of a closed m45
m45 heading towards m1 is closed due to 2 separate accidents on the m1 early this morning .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: media update expected soon on m1 crash
text: i 've just got off the phone to northamptonshire police .

a spokeswoman told me a media update on the m1 crash investigation is currently being prepared , so shortly we should hear more about what exactly happened this morning - and indeed if there have been any casualties .
it is not yet confirmed how many vehicles were involved , but the northampton chronicle and echo is reporting the crash involved two lorries .
author: David Keller
BBC News

documents.title: m1 likely to be shut until mid-afternoon
text: highways england says it is anticipated the m1 will be closed until mid-afternoon following an accident early this morning .
the motorway is shut in both directions between j16 and j18 .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: severe traffic delays continue
text: severe delays are continuing as the m1 remains closed in both directions between j16 at the a45 junction and j18 at the a5 junction .
there is congestion between j15 and j20 .
there are also severe delays on the a5 northbound between the a43 at towcester and butcher 's lane in caldecote following an accident .
and just over the border in warwickshire , due to another accident , there are severe delays on the eastbound carriageway of the m45 between j1 and the m1 at j17 .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: police issue advice for m1 drivers
text: northamptonshire police has told us it 's advising drivers to avoid the m1 between junctions 16 and 18 after a `` serious road traffic collision in the early hours of this morning '' .
the crash happened just north of j16 at 03:25 this morning and resulted in both carriageways being closed .
`` at this stage it is not known how long the road will be closed for so motorists are being advised to use alternative routes until further notice , '' the force said in a statement .
author: Jodie Smith
BBC News

documents.title: lorry shunt driver told police he 'thought he was going to die '
text: a driver who was shunted by a lorry on the m1 near northampton told police : `` i honestly thought i was going to die . ''
northamptonshire police apologised for communication failures after no-one responded to mr stockdale 's 999 call for three hours .
the force has seen the footage and an investigation is under way , but no arrests have been made yet , a spokesman confirmed .
author: Sally Chidzoy
BBC Look East home affairs correspondent

documents.title: knock-on traffic queues following m1 closure
text: i took this photo earlier this morning of the a45 heading towards daventry , where traffic was starting to build because of the m1 closure .
a caller to bbc radio northampton said he had been stuck in queues southbound for four hours .
the m1 has been closed in both directions between junctions 16 and 18 since 03:25 this morning .
author: Martin Heath
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: highways england lists alternative routes for m1 drivers
text: # m1 between j16 - j18 long delays in # northamptonshire .
road closed in both directions .
alternative routes here
@ twitterid yeah right , i will get stuck if i follow your suggestion !

documents.title: difficult morning on northamptonshire 's roads
text: as we reported earlier , the m1 has been closed in both directions following two crashes between junctions 16 for the a45 and 18 for crick .
just over the border in warwickshire , the m45 is closed between the a45 daventry road and j17 of the m1 because of that accident .
and the a5 in towcester has been closed between the a43 junction and the butcher 's lane junction following a crash involving a car and a lorry .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: weather : rather cloudy , but remaining windy and mild
text: it will be a rather cloudy day for many of us today with a little drizzly rain in places .
however , a few brighter spells may break through the cloud at times , mainly this afternoon .
maximum temperature : 13c ( 55f ) .
author: Kate Kinsella
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: headlines : m1 closed in both directions plans to cut funding for children 's centres rejected
text: here are the main stories we 're looking at this morning :
author: BBC Northampton

documents.title: m1 closed in both directions
text: there are big problems for drivers in the county this morning .
the m1 is closed in both directions - between junctions 16 and 18 - following two crashes .
police say the closures are likely to remain in place for the foreseeable future .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: good morning
text: welcome to today 's live page .
we 'll be with you between now and 18:00 .
we 're starting today with news of traffic problems on the m1 .
more very shortly .
